channel.title: Tea Or Tequila
channel.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev
channel.description: Tea Or Tequila with Evelina Diordiev is a podcast that covers multiple topics ranging from mental health to fitness to crazy encounters. In each episode of Tea Or Tequila, the topic will either be a "tea day" or a "tequila day" so you will get a different story and guest each week!
channel.itunes:keywords: guest, interview, tea, tequila, comedy, friends,

item.itunes:title: And They Were Roommates... Ft. Brooke Fusick
item.title: And They Were Roommates... Ft. Brooke Fusick
item.description: Evelina brings on her close friend and first year roommate to chat all about the film industry, university frat parties and Quentin Tarantino wannabes..
item.content:encoded: Evelina brings on her close friend and first year roommate to chat all about the film industry, university frat parties and Quentin Tarantino wannabes..
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: Spielberg's Got Some Competition Ft. Robert Lindgren
item.title: Spielberg's Got Some Competition Ft. Robert Lindgren
item.description: Recent Broadcasting Graduate Robert came on the podcast to explain what the heck broadcasting even is, why he refuses to watch Hamilton and his plans to become the next Steven Spielberg. All this and a fight between Evelina & the boys about if Marvel movies are worth the hype. Tune in!
item.content:encoded: Recent Broadcasting Graduate Robert came on the podcast to explain what the heck broadcasting even is, why he refuses to watch Hamilton and his plans to become the next Steven Spielberg. All this and a fight between Evelina & the boys about if Marvel movies are worth the hype. Tune in!
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: Burning Merch & Spitting In Mouths Ft. Taylor From Neptune
item.title: Burning Merch & Spitting In Mouths Ft. Taylor From Neptune
item.description: We have the talented & hilarious guitarist from Diamonds on Neptune on this week and we discuss all things music industry, concerts, buying friends off Kijiji and why furys are going to be the new post pandemic trend.
item.content:encoded: We have the talented & hilarious guitarist from Diamonds on Neptune on this week and we discuss all things music industry, concerts, buying friends off Kijiji and why furys are going to be the new post pandemic trend.
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: Learning how to be a Legend Slayer Ft. Haley Ahonen
item.title: Learning how to be a Legend Slayer Ft. Haley Ahonen
item.description: She's been in Vogue, is a singer/songwriter, started her own trend known as "Healing Girl Summer". Today we have the amazing Haley Ahonen on as she talks to us about her struggles with learning to be by herself, why she doesn't want to be famous and where the name legendslayer6969 really came from.....
item.content:encoded: She's been in Vogue, is a singer/songwriter, started her own trend known as "Healing Girl Summer". Today we have the amazing Haley Ahonen on as she talks to us about her struggles with learning to be by herself, why she doesn't want to be famous and where the name legendslayer6969 really came from.....
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: Truth Or Drink With Evelina & Jared
item.title: Truth Or Drink With Evelina & Jared
item.description: Evelina & Jared (also known as your hosts) decide to get to know each other more with the help of a fun little drinking game. Have you ever wondered who Evelina's least favourite guest is? If Jared has ever cheated? How explicit can this podcast really get...? Tune in to find out!!
item.content:encoded: Evelina & Jared (also known as your hosts) decide to get to know each other more with the help of a fun little drinking game. Have you ever wondered who Evelina's least favourite guest is? If Jared has ever cheated? How explicit can this podcast really get...? Tune in to find out!!

item.itunes:title: STEM Men VS Vball Girls Ft. Alyssa Mclhinney
item.title: STEM Men VS Vball Girls Ft. Alyssa Mclhinney
item.description: Alyssa comes back on the podcast for round 2 and this time there is no holding back. Evelina brings the receipts, Alyssa explains what it is like being a woman in STEM and Jared apologizes on behalf of the entire male gender for something that shouldn't even exist.
item.content:encoded: Alyssa comes back on the podcast for round 2 and this time there is no holding back. Evelina brings the receipts, Alyssa explains what it is like being a woman in STEM and Jared apologizes on behalf of the entire male gender for something that shouldn't even exist.
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: The Boys Welcome You To Season 2 Ft. Claire Mikuska
item.title: The Boys Welcome You To Season 2 Ft. Claire Mikuska
item.description: Season 2 starts with a bang. Evelina brings on her pal Claire and they talk about a variety of topics including why mullets need to be in style, grandmas not understanding Harry Styles and Claire's future girlfriend (Billie Eilish). Tune in as they discuss sexuality, skiing and so much more, while Evelina's personal assistant Jared chimes in from time to time.
item.content:encoded: Season 2 starts with a bang. Evelina brings on her pal Claire and they talk about a variety of topics including why mullets need to be in style, grandmas not understanding Harry Styles and Claire's future girlfriend (Billie Eilish). Tune in as they discuss sexuality, skiing and so much more, while Evelina's personal assistant Jared chimes in from time to time.
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: Time to end Tarantino's foot obsession Ft. Jared Oviatt
item.title: Time to end Tarantino's foot obsession Ft. Jared Oviatt
item.description: The time has come... Evelina finally opens up about a topic that she can go on and on for hours about. F I L M S. Evelina brings on fellow Letterboxer and Film enthusiast Jared Oviatt (who also happens to have his own podcast!!) They chat all about their favourite movies, which directors need to be banned from the cinema ASAP and why women are the future of filmmaking, Catch it all on this weeks episode of Tea Or Tequila.
item.content:encoded: The time has come... Evelina finally opens up about a topic that she can go on and on for hours about. F I L M S. Evelina brings on fellow Letterboxer and Film enthusiast Jared Oviatt (who also happens to have his own podcast!!) They chat all about their favourite movies, which directors need to be banned from the cinema ASAP and why women are the future of filmmaking, Catch it all on this weeks episode of Tea Or Tequila.
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: The Wonderful Life Of Customer Service Ft. Guy Goren
item.title: The Wonderful Life Of Customer Service Ft. Guy Goren
item.description: Evelina has Guy on once again and they chat all about the ups and downs of working in the costumer service industry, including times where they worked at the same store. They share stories about drunk moms, sober dads and dating coworkers. Tune in!
item.content:encoded: Evelina has Guy on once again and they chat all about the ups and downs of working in the costumer service industry, including times where they worked at the same store. They share stories about drunk moms, sober dads and dating coworkers. Tune in!
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: Passport In The Butt & You Don't Wanna Know Where I Keep Coins Ft. Guy Goren
item.title: Passport In The Butt & You Don't Wanna Know Where I Keep Coins Ft. Guy Goren
item.description: Evelina's old co worker Guy comes on and talks all about his travel stories, tips, pet peeves and more! Evelina and Guy bond over being Canadian immigrants and the confusion of learning the English language (seriously why is daughter spelt like that??) They talk about why Bali is the worst and the age old question of what defines "success".
item.content:encoded: Evelina's old co worker Guy comes on and talks all about his travel stories, tips, pet peeves and more! Evelina and Guy bond over being Canadian immigrants and the confusion of learning the English language (seriously why is daughter spelt like that??) They talk about why Bali is the worst and the age old question of what defines "success".
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: Spells, Witches, Ghosts And So Much More Ft. Deanne Mansfield
item.title: Spells, Witches, Ghosts And So Much More Ft. Deanne Mansfield
item.description: Deanne who is a professional massage therapist, tarot card reader, intuitive healer and spirit cleanser comes on the podcast and right away the conversation goes straight to religion. They chat about Paganism, skeptics (spoiler alert Kale is one) and someone finds out that they might be psychic...
item.content:encoded: Deanne who is a professional massage therapist, tarot card reader, intuitive healer and spirit cleanser comes on the podcast and right away the conversation goes straight to religion. They chat about Paganism, skeptics (spoiler alert Kale is one) and someone finds out that they might be psychic...
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: Cupid's On The Way Ft. Mckenzie Thomas & Her Date
item.title: Cupid's On The Way Ft. Mckenzie Thomas & Her Date
item.description: Evelina brings on her recently single friend Mckenzie and surprises her with an impromptu zoom date/interview with her co host Kale. Listen to the two talk about their past relationships, their thoughts on who should pay on the first date and why you should NEVER do dinner and a movie for the first date.
item.content:encoded: Evelina brings on her recently single friend Mckenzie and surprises her with an impromptu zoom date/interview with her co host Kale. Listen to the two talk about their past relationships, their thoughts on who should pay on the first date and why you should NEVER do dinner and a movie for the first date.
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: Looking into the future when you can't see it Ft. Brett The Blind Kid
item.title: Looking into the future when you can't see it Ft. Brett The Blind Kid
item.description: Evelina brings on one of her most talented and kindest friends Brett on the show. Brett talks about how losing his vision affected his  relationships, hobbies and outlook on life. Listen and learn how Brett kept skateboarding, started a music career and put up with Evelina's pranks during university.  All on today's episode!
item.content:encoded: Evelina brings on one of her most talented and kindest friends Brett on the show. Brett talks about how losing his vision affected his  relationships, hobbies and outlook on life. Listen and learn how Brett kept skateboarding, started a music career and put up with Evelina's pranks during university.  All on today's episode!
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: The Secret To Long Distance Friendships Ft. Hailey & Haley
item.title: The Secret To Long Distance Friendships Ft. Hailey & Haley
item.description: Longtime best friends Hailey & Haley come on to discuss how to have long lasting friendships, what to do if you do not trust your friends boyfriend and their biggest gym pet peeves. Hailey and Evelina also discuss something they have in common (hint: it may or may not be an ex boyfriend). Tune in for this chill n' candid convo!
item.content:encoded: Longtime best friends Hailey & Haley come on to discuss how to have long lasting friendships, what to do if you do not trust your friends boyfriend and their biggest gym pet peeves. Hailey and Evelina also discuss something they have in common (hint: it may or may not be an ex boyfriend). Tune in for this chill n' candid convo!
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: Out Of The Closet And Onto The Podcast Ft. Charli Bolichowski
item.title: Out Of The Closet And Onto The Podcast Ft. Charli Bolichowski
item.description: Evelina brings on her childhood friend Charli who transitioned from being a woman to a man. They talk about the hardships of being in the LGBTQ+ community, how to shut down ignorant people and why labels can be harmful. Tune in to learn some new things and get educated!
item.content:encoded: Evelina brings on her childhood friend Charli who transitioned from being a woman to a man. They talk about the hardships of being in the LGBTQ+ community, how to shut down ignorant people and why labels can be harmful. Tune in to learn some new things and get educated!

item.itunes:title: 2021: The Year Of Trench Coats And Turtle Necks Ft. Styling by ska
item.title: 2021: The Year Of Trench Coats And Turtle Necks Ft. Styling by ska
item.description: Styling by ska (also known as Sydney) comes onto the podcast to discuss all things fashion, side hustle and confidence. Syd gives advice how to turn your small hobbies into full time professional careers and teaches Evelina and Kale fashion tips the aren't just their everyday athlesuire.
item.content:encoded: Styling by ska (also known as Sydney) comes onto the podcast to discuss all things fashion, side hustle and confidence. Syd gives advice how to turn your small hobbies into full time professional careers and teaches Evelina and Kale fashion tips the aren't just their everyday athlesuire.
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: Can Guys And Girls Be Just Friends? Ft. Kale Sigurdson
item.title: Can Guys And Girls Be Just Friends? Ft. Kale Sigurdson
item.description: Evelina dives into some heated debates with good friend and fellow content creator Kale. They talk about wild Mexico stories, if the CIA is really watching you through your camera and the final hot take, can guys and girls be just friends? (spoiler alert they do NOT agree.) Tune in and see if you agree!
item.content:encoded: Evelina dives into some heated debates with good friend and fellow content creator Kale. They talk about wild Mexico stories, if the CIA is really watching you through your camera and the final hot take, can guys and girls be just friends? (spoiler alert they do NOT agree.) Tune in and see if you agree!
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: Time to Hit the Reset Button (Goodbye 2020!)
item.title: Time to Hit the Reset Button (Goodbye 2020!)
item.description: Evelina tries something new and has 15 guests on, all answering the same classic year end questions! Find out which of her friends do not believe in New Year Resolutions, why you should never date someone who is in engineering and what they wish they invested in at the start of 2020. (Hint: It's what Evelina had to use to orchestrate this whole fiasco) and sorry for the sound! This was VERY last minute.
item.content:encoded: Evelina tries something new and has 15 guests on, all answering the same classic year end questions! Find out which of her friends do not believe in New Year Resolutions, why you should never date someone who is in engineering and what they wish they invested in at the start of 2020. (Hint: It's what Evelina had to use to orchestrate this whole fiasco) and sorry for the sound! This was VERY last minute.
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: Are You Really Depressed Or Have They Just Not Texted You Back? Ft. Signa Lauf
item.title: Are You Really Depressed Or Have They Just Not Texted You Back? Ft. Signa Lauf
item.description: Evelina dives into her very first tea day with good pal and Psychology student Signa Lauf. They talk about mental health and the illnesses that they encounter in their everyday life (Depression, anxiety, OCD). They also chat about how being on competitive sports teams caused PTSD and why the words schizophrenia and Bipolar need to stop be used as "scary".
item.content:encoded: Evelina dives into her very first tea day with good pal and Psychology student Signa Lauf. They talk about mental health and the illnesses that they encounter in their everyday life (Depression, anxiety, OCD). They also chat about how being on competitive sports teams caused PTSD and why the words schizophrenia and Bipolar need to stop be used as "scary".
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: When You're A Vball Player Who Hits On Dads Instead Of Balls Ft. Alyssa McElhinney
item.title: When You're A Vball Player Who Hits On Dads Instead Of Balls Ft. Alyssa McElhinney
item.description: You better have your tequila out for this episode... Evelina brings on her best friend to chat about their wild times in Cuba (including a story with a crazy plot twist), how being loners helped them become friends and their ways of coping when finding out their boyfriends cheated on them. Tune in for this unfiltered girl chat.
item.content:encoded: You better have your tequila out for this episode... Evelina brings on her best friend to chat about their wild times in Cuba (including a story with a crazy plot twist), how being loners helped them become friends and their ways of coping when finding out their boyfriends cheated on them. Tune in for this unfiltered girl chat.
item.itunes:author: Evelina Diordiev

item.itunes:title: When You're A Bball Player But Don't Know How To Shoot Your Shot Ft. Sean Petrone
item.title: When You're A Bball Player But Don't Know How To Shoot Your Shot Ft. Sean Petrone
item.description:
Evelina brings her first guest on for a day of tea with a shot of tequila. They chat about Sean's most awkward interactions with girls, who should be making the first moves, which celebrity style he used to copy and how he almost killed Evelina with his truck. Tune to listen to some wild and cringe stories.

Music By Wataboi From Pixabay
item.content:encoded:

item.itunes:title: Welcome To My Deep Dark Secret
item.title: Welcome To My Deep Dark Secret
item.description:
Evelina dives in to talk about a secret she's been keeping... She also explains how Tea Or Tequila operates and what to expect from this brand new podcast!

Music by Wataboi from Pixabay
item.content:encoded:
